channel.title: Vibe Coding on Renren Zhang

item.title: How I Built an iOS App MVP in 4 Hours: A Blueprint for AI-Driven Development
item.description: Outlines a disciplined, four-phase framework for rapidly building a production-ready iOS MVP using an AI assistant, emphasizing rigorous upfront system design, sequenced prompting, and a strict validation loop with atomic Git commits.
